about_the_game:
Dive into the album for the first ever playable rap album "Level Up!"

Brought to life by the combined effort of talented artists and friends Creative Mind Frame has formed bonds with over the last decade. His goal was to highlight the often undervalued medium of music while creating a new way to tell the stories of spoken word.
detailed_description:
Dive into the album for the first ever playable rap album "Level Up!"

Brought to life by the combined effort of talented artists and friends Creative Mind Frame has formed bonds with over the last decade. His goal was to highlight the often undervalued medium of music while creating a new way to tell the stories of spoken word.

fullgame.name: Level Up: The Playable Rap Album

name: Level Up (The Playable Rap Album) Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 33 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 380 MB available space

short_description: Tracklist: 1. Top Score (Ft. Oso Cinco) 2. Level Up (Ft. Substantial & Starshine Dream) 3. No Limits (Ft. Mega Ran) 4. Tomorrow (Ft. Starshine Dream) 5. Evolution (Ft. Begoma & Ohm-I) 6. Vibes (Ft. Kadesh Flow) 7. Roll Credits
